question: Is permissible to used zakat money to treat injured animal?
answer:
QUESTION

Is permissible to used zakat money to treat injured animal?

ANSWER


Share:

In the Name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

As-salāmu `alaykum wa-rahmatullāhi wa-barakātuh. 

It is not permissible to use zakat for the treatment of injured animals.

Zakat is to be paid to a human who is a Muslim and who is poor and needy as defined by Shariah. [1] 

And Allah knows best.

Saeed Ahmed Golaub
Westmoreland, Jamaica, West Indies
Student Darul Iftaa

Checked and Approved 
Mufti Ebrahim Desai
daruliftaa.net

[1]مشكاة المصابيح (1 / 570):

وَعَن ابْنِ عَبَّاسٍ قَالَ: فَرَضَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ زَكَاةَ الْفِطْرِ طُهْرَ الصِّيَامِ مِنَ اللَّغْوِ وَالرَّفَثِ وَطُعْمَةً لِلْمَسَاكِينِ. رَوَاهُ أَبُو دَاوُد
